evidence.claim: Vital Palliative adheres to HIPAA standards in handling patient data.
The company emphasizes the importance of HL7 standards in their interoperability solutions.
Vital Palliative utilizes FHIR for data exchange in their health tech solutions.
The infrastructure supports HIPAA compliance for sensitive health information sharing.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of X12 use cases or API-first integration on their site.
